page.title: 16INDUSTRY IN MYDDLE
page.content:
Myddle has little {industry. }There is one shop and one pub and there are some small {industries} as well. There is a fruit and veg. shop also which is in Myddlewood. The shop is the main stores it is also the village post office and is open eight and a half hours a day. There is also an off licence as well.
{THE PUB The{pub} does meals at dinner time. Then it opens in the evenings and the busiest night is Saturday and the cars are parked right up the road. Most of the small {industries }are mostly to do with wood such as a man who makes garden rustic furniture . There is another man who makes things out of wood and sells them.
